createTable.remarks: Records the history and progress of workspace deletion attempts

column.name: WORKSPACE_ID
column.remarks: ID of the WORKSPACE being deleted.

column.name: APP_DELETION_STARTED
column.remarks: When the system started the deletion of workspace apps

column.name: APP_DELETION_FINISHED
column.remarks: When the system finished the deletion of workspace apps

column.name: RUNTIME_DELETION_STARTED
column.remarks: When the system started the deletion of workspace runtimes

column.name: RUNTIME_DELETION_FINISHED
column.remarks: When the system finished the deletion of workspace runtimes

column.name: WSM_DELETION_STARTED
column.remarks: When the system started the deletion of WSM records

column.name: WSM_DELETION_FINISHED
column.remarks: When the system finished the deletion of WSM records
